alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack; Southern Grafton; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Sullivan, south central Grafton, central Belknap and northwestern Merrimack Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Danbury, or near New London, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laconia, Franklin, Meredith, New London, Grafton, Gilmanton, Danbury, Warner, Belmont, Gilford, Bristol, Andover, Alexandria, Hill, Wilmot, Tilton, Sanbornton, New Hampton, Salisbury and Northfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 28 and 29. Interstate 93 between mile markers 53 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
